overview: Lallu Ki Laila is a Bhojpuri movie released on 12 Sep, 2019. The movie is directed by Sushil Kumar Upadhyay and featured Amrapali Dubey, Dinesh Lal Yadav Nirahua, Yamini Singh and Dev Singh as lead characters. Other popular actor who was roped in for Lallu Ki Laila is Kanak Pandey.
title: Lallu Ki Laila
